    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020407</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Identifica los pasajes de la Odisea</string>
            <string language="en">Identify extracts of The Odyssey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnen Sie Extrakte der Odyssee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Identifiez les extraits de l'odyssée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Identifique extratos do odyssey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Identifichi gli estratti del odyssey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορίστε τα αποσπάσματα της οδύσσειας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Actividad para relacionar imágenes con el contenido argumental de la Odisea.</string>
            <string language="en">An activity which asks the students to match images with parts of the plot of the Odyssey.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Odisea</string>
            <string language="en">Odyssey</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">grecolatina</string>
            <string language="en">Graeco-Roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Aktivität, die die Kursteilnehmer bittet, 
Bilder mit Teilen des Plots der Odyssee zusammenzubringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité qui demande aux étudiants 
d'apparier des images avec des parties du traçage de l'odyssée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade que peça que os estudantes combinem
imagens com as partes do lote do odyssey.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività che chiede agli allievi di abbinare 
le immagini con le parti del diagramma del odyssey.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα που ζητά από τους σπουδαστές για να 
ταιριάξει με τις εικόνες τα μέρη της πλοκής της οδύσσειας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Odyssee</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graeco-Römisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Odyssée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graeco-Romain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Odyssey</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Graeco-graeco-Roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Odyssey</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Graeco-Romano</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραεθο-ρωμαϊκά</string>
          </keyword>
